name: Wakim, Mina

education.field: Assist with dip coater equipment to resolve problems

for optimizing production resources and increasing efficiency

resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Results-driven and technically creative Principal Process Engineer with 15+ years of experience leading product and process innovation across the pharmaceutical, medical device, chemical, and manufacturing sectors. Adept in GMP, ISO, and design control environments, with proven success in process optimization, scale-up manufacturing, and cross-functional project leadership. Holds both Bachelor’s and Master’s degrees in Chemical and Biological Engineering from NYU Polytechnic. Recognized
